epic.title: Project Setup
epic.description: Initial project setup and configuration. Complete these tasks to establish the project foundation.

tasks.title: Configure development environment
tasks.description:
## Context
New project needs development tooling configured.

## Tasks
- [ ] Set up linting/formatting
- [ ] Configure editor settings
- [ ] Add pre-commit hooks if needed

## Acceptance Criteria
- Development tools work consistently

tasks.title: Set up testing framework
tasks.description:
## Context
Project needs automated testing from the start.

## Tasks
- [ ] Choose and install test framework
- [ ] Create test directory structure
- [ ] Add example test
- [ ] Configure test runner

## Acceptance Criteria
- Tests can be run with single command
- Example test passes

tasks.title: Configure CI/CD pipeline
tasks.description:
## Context
Automated builds and tests ensure code quality.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create GitHub Actions workflow (or equivalent)
- [ ] Configure build step
- [ ] Configure test step
- [ ] Add status badge to README

## Acceptance Criteria
- CI runs on push to main
- CI runs on pull requests
- Build status visible in README

tasks.title: Write initial documentation
tasks.description:
## Context
Documentation helps onboard contributors.

## Tasks
- [ ] Update README with project-specific details
- [ ] Document setup instructions
- [ ] Document contribution guidelines
- [ ] Add architecture overview if complex

## Acceptance Criteria
- New contributor can set up project from README
- Key decisions documented
